Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]Spawn Bias: Rivers (Tier 3).[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Dispersing [ICON_Barbarian] Barbarian Outpost also grants a Tribal Village reward.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5% [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Faith] Faith per City-State Suzerainty.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Levying City-State Units costs 50% less [ICON_Gold] Gold.
